verbose_text: Second, we tested whether the observed impact of nuclease based extraction methods was due to the premature lysis of bacterial cells during initial processing with EDTA, which is used to inactivate the endonuclease used in benzonase1 extraction and has been demonstrated to kill P. aeruginosa growing planktonically and in biofilms.
evidence: EDTA, which is used to inactivate the endonuclease
